item.title: Dog poo left, 2nd February
item.description:
More dog poo left on the pavements on the walk into school, and more further up on same side. Pavements are disgustingly dirty down all the way down

item.title: Lane markings contradictory, 2nd February
item.description:
The middle lane of Hatherley Lane approaching Arle Court roundabout shows “A40 Glos A40 Chelt” but for the Cheltenham direction the small dashed lane markings push them into the left lane at the traffic lights. This lane is only for the B4063 which is not the direction marked on the approach. This forces traffic to change lanes suddenly (and potentially dangerously cutting into other motorists).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arle Court Roundabout, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unacceptable surface water on road & up driveway, 1st February
item.description:
Infront of 99 Gretton Road Winchcombe GL54 5EJ. This is my mother's residence. She is elderly and finds the current flooding issue difficult & has git much worse. This could make her slip when on foot due to mud collecting on the drive & is unable to leave the house in anything other than waterproof footwear. Cars could aquaplane on the road creating a collision hazard. This is also an aggravated situation from the bus stop and buses spraying water over the driveway when passing through these huge puddles! I have serious concerns and would be pleased if you could come out and fix the drainage issue. This issue has frequently been reported & maybe suggest a larger drainage pipe to the stream which runs to the side of the house or any other recommendation to alleviate the problem as I was horrified to see the extent of water collection when visiting on Saturday & believe the neighbour opposite has also raised a serious concern. I would be pleased of a reply at your earliest convenience before someone gets hurt on wet days. Thankyou for your time looking into this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnmeadow Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Leaf sludge on road, 1st February
item.description:
The kerbside approx 40m either side of 54 Prestbury Road is covered in leaf sludge from over 2 years accumulation which is turning the parking area into hazardous state for motorists when parking as it is easy to lose your footing on the road after parking, especially in wet weather.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54;54a, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
